Servo Demodulator.description: {"component": "Servo Demodulator", "inputs": [{"line": "Signal From Read Head", "connected_to": "Read Head", "connection_point": "Output of Read Head"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Output to A/D", "connected_to": "A/D Converter", "connection_point": "Input of A/D Converter"}]}

A/D Converter.description: {"component": "A/D Converter", "inputs": [{"line": "Input 1", "connected_to": "Servo Demodulator", "connection_point": "Output of Servo Demodulator"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Output 1", "connected_to": "DSP", "connection_point": "Input of DSP"}]}

DSP Processor.description: {"component": "DSP Processor", "inputs": [{"line": "A/D Output", "connected_to": "A/D Converter", "connection_point": "Output Pin"}], "outputs": [{"line": "DSP Output", "connected_to": "D/A Converter", "connection_point": "Input Pin"}]}

D/A Converter.description: {"component": "D/A Converter", "inputs": [{"line": "DSP Output", "connected_to": "DSP", "connection_point": "Output Pin"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Analog Signal", "connected_to": "Actuator Driver", "connection_point": "Input Pin"}]}

Actuator Driver.description: {"component": "Actuator Driver", "inputs": [{"line": "D/A Output", "connected_to": "D/A Converter", "connection_point": "Output Pin of D/A Converter"}], "outputs": [{"line": "To Actuator Coil", "connected_to": "Actuator Coil", "connection_point": "Input Terminal of Actuator Coil"}]}

Actuator Coil.description: {"component": "Actuator Coil", "inputs": [{"line": "To Actuator Coil", "connected_to": "Actuator Driver", "connection_point": "Output of Actuator Driver"}], "outputs": []}

VCO.description: {"component": "VCO", "inputs": [{"line": "FCW", "connected_to": "DSM", "connection_point": "Pin connected to FCW"}], "outputs": [{"line": "f_VCO", "connected_to": "DMD", "connection_point": "Pin connected to DMD"}]}

DMD.description: {"component": "DMD", "inputs": [{"line": "f_VCO", "connected_to": "VCO", "connection_point": "Output of VCO"}, {"line": "MC", "connected_to": "DSM", "connection_point": "Output of DSM"}], "outputs": [{"line": "f_DSM", "connected_to": "PG", "connection_point": "Input of PG"}]}

DIV.description: {"component": "DIV", "inputs": [{"line": "f_INJ", "connected_to": "ILO", "connection_point": "Output of ILO"}], "outputs": [{"line": "f_DIV", "connected_to": "None (output terminal)", "connection_point": "Right side of DIV"}]}

DSM.description: {"component": "DSM", "inputs": [{"line": "FCW", "connected_to": "External signal source (FCW)", "connection_point": "Input pin of DSM"}, {"line": "MC", "connected_to": "DMD", "connection_point": "Output pin of DMD connected to DSM"}], "outputs": [{"line": "f_DSM", "connected_to": "PG", "connection_point": "Input pin of PG"}]}

MC.description: {"component": "MC", "inputs": [{"line": "f_DSM", "connected_to": "DMD", "connection_point": "Pin of DMD labeled f_DSM"}, {"line": "FCW", "connected_to": "DSM", "connection_point": "Pin of DSM labeled FCW"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Control signal", "connected_to": "DSM", "connection_point": "Pin of DSM connected to MC"}]}

DCO.description: {"component": "DCO", "inputs": [{"line": "VOUTB", "connected_to": "Reference Divider", "connection_point": "Input of Reference Divider"}, {"line": "RESET", "connected_to": "Tuning Controller", "connection_point": "RESET input of Tuning Controller"}], "outputs": [{"line": "VOUT", "connected_to": "/2 Divider", "connection_point": "Input of /2 Divider"}]}

Reference Divider.description: {"component": "Reference Divider", "inputs": [{"line": "REF_CLK", "connected_to": "External Clock Source", "connection_point": "Input Pin of REF_CLK"}, {"line": "REF_DIV_SEL<2:0>", "connected_to": "Control Logic", "connection_point": "Input Pins of REF_DIV_SEL"}, {"line": "RESET", "connected_to": "Reset Circuit", "connection_point": "Input Pin of RESET"}], "outputs": [{"line": "COM_CLK", "connected_to": "Digital Phase Detector & Calculator", "connection_point": "Input Pin of COM_CLK"}]}

18-bit Counter.description: {"component": "18-bit Counter", "inputs": [{"line": "F_DCO_DIV", "connected_to": "/2", "connection_point": "Output of /2 divider"}, {"line": "RST_CNT", "connected_to": "Digital Phase Detector & Calculator", "connection_point": "Reset signal from Digital Phase Detector & Calculator"}, {"line": "MSK_CNT", "connected_to": "Digital Phase Detector & Calculator", "connection_point": "Masking signal from Digital Phase Detector & Calculator"}, {"line": "RESET", "connected_to": "Tuning Controller", "connection_point": "Reset signal from Tuning Controller"}], "outputs": [{"line": "DCO_CNT<17:0>", "connected_to": "Digital Phase Detector & Calculator", "connection_point": "Counter value input to Digital Phase Detector & Calculator"}]}

Digital Phase Detector & Calculator.description: {"component": "Digital Phase Detector & Calculator", "inputs": [{"line": "DCO_CNT<17:0>", "connected_to": "18-bit Counter", "connection_point": "Output of the counter"}, {"line": "COMP_REF<17:0>", "connected_to": "MUX", "connection_point": "Output of MUX"}, {"line": "RESET", "connected_to": "Tuning Controller", "connection_point": "RESET signal from Tuning Controller"}], "outputs": [{"line": "UP/DN", "connected_to": "Tuning Controller", "connection_point": "Input to Tuning Controller"}]}

Tuning Controller.description: {"component": "Tuning Controller", "inputs": [{"line": "UP/DN", "connected_to": "Digital Phase Detector & Calculator", "connection_point": "Output of Digital Phase Detector & Calculator"}, {"line": "RESET", "connected_to": "Frequency-Locked Loop (FLL)", "connection_point": "External RESET signal"}], "outputs": [{"line": "DCO_CNT<17:0>", "connected_to": "18-bit Counter", "connection_point": "Input of 18-bit Counter"}]}

MUX.description: {"component": "MUX", "inputs": [{"line": "EXT_REF<17:0>", "connected_to": "External Reference Signal", "connection_point": "Input Pin 1"}, {"line": "INT_REF<17:0>", "connected_to": "Internal Reference Signal", "connection_point": "Input Pin 2"}, {"line": "EXT_COMP_EN", "connected_to": "External Comparator Enable", "connection_point": "Control Input Pin"}], "outputs": [{"line": "COMP_REF<17:0>", "connected_to": "Digital Phase Detector & Calculator", "connection_point": "Output Pin"}]}

FCW Map Table.description: {"component": "FCW Map Table", "inputs": [{"line": "CH_SEL<5:0>", "connected_to": "Tuning Controller", "connection_point": "Input pins of Tuning Controller"}, {"line": "INT_REF<17:0>", "connected_to": "MUX", "connection_point": "One of the MUX input ports"}], "outputs": [{"line": "EXT_REF<17:0>", "connected_to": "MUX", "connection_point": "Another MUX input port"}]}

Differential Stage.description: {"component": "Differential Stage", "inputs": [{"line": "V1", "connected_to": "External Source", "connection_point": "Pin 1 (Left Input)"}, {"line": "V2", "connected_to": "External Source", "connection_point": "Pin 2 (Right Input)"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Output", "connected_to": "High gain Stage", "connection_point": "Input Pin"}]}

High gain Stage.description: {"component": "High gain Stage", "inputs": [{"line": "Input from Differential Stage", "connected_to": "Differential Stage", "connection_point": "Output of Differential Stage"}, {"line": "Biasing Input", "connected_to": "Biasing Circuit", "connection_point": "Output of Biasing Circuit"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Output to Compensation Circuitry", "connected_to": "Compensation Circuitry", "connection_point": "Input of Compensation Circuitry"}, {"line": "Final Output (Vout)", "connected_to": "External Load", "connection_point": "Terminal Vout"}]}

Compensation Circuitry.description: {"component": "Compensation Circuitry", "inputs": [{"line": "Input 1", "connected_to": "Differential Stage", "connection_point": "Output of Differential Stage"}, {"line": "Input 2", "connected_to": "High gain Stage", "connection_point": "Feedback from High gain Stage"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Output 1", "connected_to": "High gain Stage", "connection_point": "Input of High gain Stage"}]}

Biasing Circuit.description: {"component": "Biasing Circuit", "inputs": [], "outputs": [{"line": "Output 1", "connected_to": "Differential Stage", "connection_point": "Connection point at the bottom of Differential Stage"}]}

START STOP LOGIC.description: {"component": "START STOP LOGIC", "inputs": [{"line": "SCL", "connected_to": "External SCL signal", "connection_point": "Pin connected to SCL"}, {"line": "SDA", "connected_to": "External SDA signal", "connection_point": "Pin connected to SDA"}], "outputs": [{"line": "SERIAL CONTROL LOGIC", "connected_to": "SERIAL CONTROL LOGIC", "connection_point": "Input pins of SERIAL CONTROL LOGIC"}]}

SERIAL CONTROL LOGIC.description: {"component": "SERIAL CONTROL LOGIC", "inputs": [{"line": "START STOP LOGIC", "connected_to": "START STOP LOGIC", "connection_point": "Output of START STOP LOGIC"}, {"line": "COMP", "connected_to": "DEVICE ADDRESS COMPARATOR", "connection_point": "Output of DEVICE ADDRESS COMPARATOR"}, {"line": "LOAD", "connected_to": "DATA WORD ADDR/COUNTER", "connection_point": "LOAD input of DATA WORD ADDR/COUNTER"}, {"line": "INC", "connected_to": "DATA WORD ADDR/COUNTER", "connection_point": "INC input of DATA WORD ADDR/COUNTER"}], "outputs": [{"line": "EN", "connected_to": "H.V. PUMP/TIMING", "connection_point": "Input of H.V. PUMP/TIMING"}]}

DEVICE ADDRESS COMPARATOR.description: {"component": "DEVICE ADDRESS COMPARATOR", "inputs": [{"line": "A2", "connected_to": "External Address Input", "connection_point": "Pin A2"}, {"line": "A1", "connected_to": "External Address Input", "connection_point": "Pin A1"}, {"line": "A0", "connected_to": "External Address Input", "connection_point": "Pin A0"}, {"line": "LOAD", "connected_to": "SERIAL CONTROL LOGIC", "connection_point": "LOAD Output"}], "outputs": [{"line": "COMP", "connected_to": "SERIAL CONTROL LOGIC", "connection_point": "COMP Input"}]}

DATA WORD ADDR/COUNTER.description: {"component": "DATA WORD ADDR/COUNTER", "inputs": [{"line": "R/W", "connected_to": "DEVICE ADDRESS COMPARATOR", "connection_point": "R/W pin"}, {"line": "LOAD", "connected_to": "SERIAL CONTROL LOGIC", "connection_point": "LOAD output"}, {"line": "INC", "connected_to": "SERIAL CONTROL LOGIC", "connection_point": "INC output"}], "outputs": [{"line": "X DEC", "connected_to": "EEPROM", "connection_point": "Address input"}, {"line": "Y DEC", "connected_to": "SERIAL MUX", "connection_point": "Address input"}]}

H.V. PUMP/TIMING.description: {"component": "H.V. PUMP/TIMING", "inputs": [{"line": "EN", "connected_to": "SERIAL CONTROL LOGIC", "connection_point": "Output of SERIAL CONTROL LOGIC"}], "outputs": []}

DATA RECOVERY.description: {"component": "DATA RECOVERY", "inputs": [{"line": "X DEC", "connected_to": "SERIAL CONTROL LOGIC", "connection_point": "X DEC output"}, {"line": "Y DEC", "connected_to": "DATA WORD ADDR/COUNTER", "connection_point": "Y DEC output"}], "outputs": [{"line": "X DEC", "connected_to": "EEPROM", "connection_point": "X DEC input"}, {"line": "Y DEC", "connected_to": "EEPROM", "connection_point": "Y DEC input"}]}

EEPROM.description: {"component": "EEPROM", "inputs": [{"line": "X DEC", "connected_to": "DATA RECOVERY", "connection_point": "Output of DATA RECOVERY block"}, {"line": "Y DEC", "connected_to": "SERIAL MUX", "connection_point": "Output of SERIAL MUX block"}], "outputs": []}

SERIAL MUX.description: {"component": "SERIAL MUX", "inputs": [{"line": "X DEC", "connected_to": "DATA RECOVERY", "connection_point": "Output of DATA RECOVERY block"}, {"line": "Y DEC", "connected_to": "DATA WORD ADDR/COUNTER", "connection_point": "Output of DATA WORD ADDR/COUNTER block"}], "outputs": [{"line": "DOUT/ACK", "connected_to": "DOUT/ACK LOGIC", "connection_point": "Input of DOUT/ACK LOGIC block"}]}

DOUT/ACK LOGIC.description: {"component": "DOUT/ACK LOGIC", "inputs": [{"line": "DIN", "connected_to": "DATA RECOVERY", "connection_point": "X DEC"}, {"line": "R/W", "connected_to": "DATA WORD ADDR/COUNTER", "connection_point": "R/W"}, {"line": "Y DEC", "connected_to": "SERIAL MUX", "connection_point": "Y DEC"}], "outputs": [{"line": "DOUT", "connected_to": "External Output", "connection_point": "DOUT"}]}

Duty Cycle Controller.description: {"component": "Duty Cycle Controller", "inputs": [{"line": "DCCLK", "connected_to": "Counter", "connection_point": "CKV input of Counter"}, {"line": "DCFD", "connected_to": "Counter", "connection_point": "Retiming input of Counter"}], "outputs": [{"line": "DGEN", "connected_to": "Counter", "connection_point": "Floor input of Counter"}]}

Counter.description: {"component": "Counter", "inputs": [{"line": "CKV", "connected_to": "Sampler", "connection_point": "Output of Sampler (CKV)"}, {"line": "DCCLK", "connected_to": "Duty Cycle Controller", "connection_point": "Output of Duty Cycle Controller (DCCLK)"}], "outputs": [{"line": "CNT", "connected_to": "DFF", "connection_point": "Input of DFF"}]}

Retiming.description: {"component": "Retiming", "inputs": [{"line": "DCCLK", "connected_to": "Duty Cycle Controller", "connection_point": "Output of Duty Cycle Controller"}, {"line": "CNT", "connected_to": "Counter", "connection_point": "Output of Counter"}], "outputs": [{"line": "DCFD", "connected_to": "Floor", "connection_point": "Input of Floor"}]}

DFF (Flip-Flop).description: {"component": "DFF (Flip-Flop)", "inputs": [{"line": "CNT", "connected_to": "Counter", "connection_point": "Pin labeled CNT"}, {"line": "C0", "connected_to": "Floor", "connection_point": "Inverting input of XOR gate"}, {"line": "C1", "connected_to": "Floor", "connection_point": "Non-inverting input of XOR gate"}], "outputs": [{"line": "C0", "connected_to": "Floor", "connection_point": "Inverting input of XOR gate"}, {"line": "C1", "connected_to": "Floor", "connection_point": "Non-inverting input of XOR gate"}]}

Floor.description: {"component": "Floor", "inputs": [{"line": "C0", "connected_to": "DFF (left)", "connection_point": "Output of DFF (left)"}, {"line": "C1-C0", "connected_to": "XOR Gate", "connection_point": "Output of XOR Gate"}], "outputs": [{"line": "FE", "connected_to": "State Machine", "connection_point": "Input of State Machine"}]}

State Machine.description: {"component": "State Machine", "inputs": [{"line": "REF", "connected_to": "Transformer-based Stacked-gm DCO", "connection_point": "Output of Transformer-based Stacked-gm DCO"}, {"line": "ODZ", "connected_to": "DZ Delay", "connection_point": "Output of DZ Delay"}], "outputs": [{"line": "EN", "connected_to": "Transformer-based Stacked-gm DCO", "connection_point": "Enable input of Transformer-based Stacked-gm DCO"}]}

PFD (Phase Frequency Detector).description: {"component": "PFD (Phase Frequency Detector)", "inputs": [{"line": "Input 1", "connected_to": "8bit Truncated CS-DTC", "connection_point": "REFA"}, {"line": "Input 2", "connected_to": "Transformer-based Stacked-gm DCO", "connection_point": "CKG"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Output 1", "connected_to": "DZ Delay", "connection_point": "Input"}]}

DZ Delay.description: {"component": "DZ Delay", "inputs": [{"line": "PFD Output", "connected_to": "Phase Frequency Detector (PFD)", "connection_point": "Output of PFD"}, {"line": "Coarse TDC Output", "connected_to": "Coarse Time-to-Digital Converter (TDC)", "connection_point": "Output of Coarse TDC"}], "outputs": [{"line": "ODZ Output", "connected_to": "State Machine", "connection_point": "Input labeled 'ODZ'"}]}

Coarse TDC.description: {"component": "Coarse TDC", "inputs": [{"line": "CKG", "connected_to": "Transformer-based Stacked-gm DCO", "connection_point": "Output of the DCO"}, {"line": "REFA", "connected_to": "8bit Truncated CS-DTC", "connection_point": "Output of REFA"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Coarse (11bit)", "connected_to": "DLF", "connection_point": "Input of DLF"}]}

DLF (Digital Loop Filter).description: {"component": "DLF (Digital Loop Filter)", "inputs": [{"line": "Coarse TDC Output", "connected_to": "Coarse TDC", "connection_point": "Output of Coarse TDC"}, {"line": "4bit TDC Output", "connected_to": "4bit TDC", "connection_point": "Output of 4bit TDC"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Fine Output", "connected_to": "Transformer-based Stacked-gm DCO", "connection_point": "Fine (9bit) input"}, {"line": "Coarse Output", "connected_to": "Transformer-based Stacked-gm DCO", "connection_point": "Coarse (11bit) input"}]}

8bit Truncated CS-DTC.description: {"component": "8bit Truncated CS-DTC", "inputs": [{"line": "REFA", "connected_to": "10-MHz REF", "connection_point": "Input terminal of REFA"}, {"line": "REFB", "connected_to": "Sampler", "connection_point": "Output terminal of Sampler"}], "outputs": [{"line": "FB", "connected_to": "Coarse TDC", "connection_point": "Input terminal of Coarse TDC"}]}

Sampler.description: {"component": "Sampler", "inputs": [{"line": "REFA", "connected_to": "8bit Truncated CS-DTC", "connection_point": "Pin labeled REFA"}, {"line": "CKV", "connected_to": "Counter", "connection_point": "Pin labeled CKV"}, {"line": "EN", "connected_to": "DSM-based Controller", "connection_point": "Pin labeled EN"}], "outputs": [{"line": "τSAM", "connected_to": "8bit Truncated CS-DTC", "connection_point": "Pin labeled τSAM"}]}

Transformer-based Stacked-gm DCO.description: {"component": "Transformer-based Stacked-gm DCO", "inputs": [{"line": "Fine (9bit)", "connected_to": "DLF", "connection_point": "Output of DLF"}, {"line": "Coarse TDC", "connected_to": "Coarse TDC", "connection_point": "Output of Coarse TDC"}, {"line": "CKG", "connected_to": "MMD", "connection_point": "CKG signal from MMD"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Switching Feedback", "connected_to": "DSM-based Controller", "connection_point": "Feedback input of DSM-based Controller"}]}

DSM-based Controller.description: {"component": "DSM-based Controller", "inputs": [{"line": "FCW", "connected_to": "Transformer-based Stacked-gm DCO", "connection_point": "Fine (9bit) input"}, {"line": "Switching Feedback", "connected_to": "Transformer-based Stacked-gm DCO", "connection_point": "Feedback input"}], "outputs": [{"line": "DTC Code (8bit)", "connected_to": "8bit Truncated CS-DTC", "connection_point": "Input for DTC code"}]}
